          <title>
            <string language="en">THe Blue Brain Project</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Blaue Gehirn-Projekt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Projet Bleu de Cerveau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Projeto Azul Do Cérebro</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">THe μπλε πρόγραμμα εγκεφάλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Proyecto Azul Del Cerebro</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interesting illustrated explanation of brain research on the architecture of the brain.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neurology</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Interessieren veranschaulichte Erklärung der 
Gehirnforschung auf der Architektur des Gehirns.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Intéresser a illustré l'explication de la 
recherche de cerveau sur l'architecture du cerveau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Interessar ilustrou a explanação da pesquisa do 
cérebro sobre a arquitetura do cérebro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Interessare ha illustrato la spiegazione di 
ricerca del cervello sull'architettura del cervello.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να ενδιαφέρει επεξήγησε την εξήγηση της έρευνας 
εγκεφάλου για την αρχιτεκτονική του εγκεφάλου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El interesar ilustró la explicación de la 
investigación del cerebro sobre la configuración del cerebro.</string>
          </description>
